description.lang: > Horizontal 7-step green LED display indicates selected brightness level> Energy Save option reduces power consumption and extends bulb life> 49 Possible combinations of fade rates, from soft to instant> Manual and remote ON/OFF/DIM/BRIGHT control of connected loads> Requires the Vizia RF + Handheld Remote - VRCPG for programming and control of the Vizia RF + System (sold separately)

deviceDescription.productName: Electronic Low Voltage Scene Capable Dimmer
